entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
